title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Huta-Studenetska, Bleshnya, Liskivschyna, Karpovychi of C...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Huta-Studenetska, Bleshnya, Liskivschyna, Karpovychi of Chernihiv region, Boyaro-Lezhachi, Bilopillya, Kindrativka, Zapsillya, Myropillya, Popivka, Dmytrivka of Sumy region, Kozacha Lopan, Vovchansk, Krasne, Neskuchne of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Semenivka of Chernihiv region, Neskuchne, Oleksandrivka, Druzhba of Sumy region, Odradne, Kolodyazne of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
